#{item}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS USER_COUNT FROM USR_INFO WHERE CMPLX_ID = #{cmplxId} ;

SELECT U.USR_ID, USER_ID, USER_NM, CELL, EMAIL, CELL_YN, EMAIL_YN, U.CMPLX_ID, C.CMPLX_NM, DONG, HO, HEAD_ID, AVATAR_IMG_SRC, USER_ALIAS, U_E.UPD_DTTM, U_E.REG_DTTM FROM USR_INFO AS U LEFT JOIN USR_INFO_EXT AS U_E ON U.USR_ID = U_E.USR_ID JOIN COMPLEX_M AS C ON U.CMPLX_ID = C.CMPLX_ID WHERE U.USR_ID = #{usrId} ;
